Quality Education.reason: Course emphasizes understanding and applying expertise in operations management → relevant to Quality Education.

Develop an understanding of and an appreciation for the production and operations management function.

evidence: To understand the importance of productivity and competitiveness of an organization.

the renewed importance of this aspect of organizational strategy.

evidence: Obtain an understanding of quality management practice in organizations.

Emphasis is on managerial processes for effective operations in both goods-producing and service-rendering organization.

supply-chain management activities

quality control
